resp = client.search(
    index="restaurants",
    retriever={
        "standard": {
            "query": {
                "bool": {
                    "should": [
                        {
                            "match": {
                                "region": "Austria"
                            }
                        }
                    ],
                    "filter": [
                        {
                            "term": {
                                "year": "2019"
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
